Item.Value: Write in your journal and go to bed?[Yes:SleepNow|No:Nothing]
The mystic sigils indicate... high moon in the Western Quarter... Goldfish...
-zra? Ah! I see you've traversed the Widdershins path of the darkest mind! Well done!
An inscription upon the door reads: "None shall pass until all are vanquished."
A strangely shaped keyhole is embedded in the door [Attempt to Open:OpenDoor|Never Mind:Cancel]
As you place the item into the keyhole, it vanishes, becoming one with the door!
No matter how hard you try, it seems like that item won't fit here.
